alert.note: Alert for Cloud; Republic (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:00AM CDT until June 29 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT FOR REPUBLIC AND NORTHEASTERN CLOUD COUNTIES... At 600 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Agenda, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Belleville, Clyde, Scandia, Cuba, Norway, Munden, Narka and Agenda. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
